alert.note: Alert for Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 4:59PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Pittsburg County through 530 PM CST... At 459 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Kiowa, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny to nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Hartshorne... Krebs... Kiowa... Savanna... Alderson... Haywood... Mcalester Regional Airport... Blanco... Haileyville... Pittsburg... Dow... Bache... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for southeastern Oklahoma.
